title: Report Natural Gas Odor
description: A customer calls reporting the smell of natural gas (rotten eggs) inside their home. This is a critical safety scenario.

tasks.description: Immediately advise the customer to evacuate the premises and not use any electronics or light switches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows safety protocol and provides critical instructions.

tasks.description: While the customer is evacuating, dispatch an emergency crew to the location with the highest priority.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a Priority 1 emergency work order.

tasks.description: Confirm the customer's location and a safe callback number once they are outside.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the address and contact details for the emergency crew.
